name: Belarus EU Business Council
membership: The BEUBC has a representative in Minsk to assist international companies with any issues regarding inward investment or trade matters, to help provide business solutions for any commercial problems. We offer business consulting solutions to EU and other international companies looking to source business information about Belarus.
goal: To promote trade and investment between Belarus and the EU.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Consumers, Economy, finance and the euro, Energy, Enlargement, Environment, External Relations, Food Safety, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives: Eastern Neighbourhood Policy, EU Belarus relations, trade and investment initiatives, Foreign Policy.
